snippet: Britain's Andy Murray has reunited with former coach Ivan Lendl as the world number two prepares for another tilt at the Wimbledon title....
lead_paragraph: Britain's Andy Murray has reunited with former coach Ivan Lendl as the world number two prepares for another tilt at the Wimbledon title.

headline.print_headline: Murray Hopes New Lendl Partnership Is a Long One
headline.main: Murray Hopes New Lendl Partnership Is a Long One
